name: Trilogy, Inc.
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Trilogy, Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Chicago, IL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $116K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 552 beneficiaries.
